Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the photograph shows actor Elijah Wood with his identical twin brother when in fact it is a composite image of Elijah Wood posing with fans.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that Elijah Wood has an identical twin brother.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph shows Elijah Wood with his twin brother without verifying the authenticity of the image.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the two men in the photograph are not twin brothers but the same person, Elijah Wood.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation that the composite photograph was created to show the resemblance between Elijah Wood and Daniel Radcliffe.
